title: Superheroes Reborn: Five Origin Stories
description: From a child of the prophecy to a top secret super-soldier, sidekicks who abscond their duties and ones who fall in love with their archnemeses, superheroes never fail to inspire us. Superheroes Reborn collects five origin stories, including:“The Indigo Mantis” by E. Catherine Tobler“Kid Dark Against the Machine” by Tansy Rayner Roberts“How to Piss Off A Failed Super-Soldier” by John Chu“Superior” by Jessica Lack“The Life and Times of Angel Evans” by Meredith DebonnaireAll stories originally edited and published by The Book Smugglers.
author: Ana Grilo
